entry.title: Aztec Connect the first privacy preserving zk-Rollup is live on Ethereum and you might want to give it a spin. Any L1 app will be able to add private ...
entry.summary: Aztec Connect the first privacy preserving zk-Rollup is live on Ethereum and you might want to give it a spin. Any L1 app will be able to add private transactions but to kick things off the @aztecnetwork team launched its own dapp where you can earn yield on Lido & Element.

entry.title: AIRDROP ALERT 🚨 @geniexyz the NFT aggregator got acquired by @Uniswap Users who used Genie more than once before April 15th or hold a Genie NFT wil...
entry.summary: AIRDROP ALERT 🚨 @geniexyz the NFT aggregator got acquired by @Uniswap Users who used Genie more than once before April 15th or hold a Genie NFT will receive a $USDC airdrop.🪂 Uniswap Labs 🦄: 4/ One more thing… To welcome the Genie community to the Uniswap universe, we’ll be airdropping USDC later this summer to anyone who used Genie more than once before April 15 or holds a GENIE:GEM NFT 🧞‍♂️🦄

entry.title: Arbitrum Odyssey starting in 1 hour! 🔵 During Bridge week users who bridge $ETH using the bridge that ends up with the most number wallets bridging...
entry.summary: Arbitrum Odyssey starting in 1 hour! 🔵 During Bridge week users who bridge $ETH using the bridge that ends up with the most number wallets bridging, receive a special Bonus NFT 🌟 Our gut tells us the Bonus NFT could be used as multiplier during the $ARBI airdrop 👀
